tool_description: A movie trivia API that provides access to a database of trivia and obscure facts about movies and movie actors. This API could be used by movie trivia websites, apps, and other businesses that want to offer movie trivia data to their users.
name: Movies Trivia API
title: Movies Trivia API

api_list.name: Populars moovies
api_list.description: Get all populars moovie searching by catégories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movies-trivia-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/moovies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-trivia-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search by title
api_list.description: Search movie by it's title, to get all informations about it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movies-trivia-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/video/iron man"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-trivia-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movies-trivia-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/video/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-trivia-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
